医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
常规血液检查可以加速胃痛或腹胀患者的癌症诊断伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，常规血液检查的结果可用于加快胃痛或腹胀患者的癌症诊断速度。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Routine-blood-tests-could-accelerate-cancer-diagnosis-for-病人-with-stomach-pain-or-bloating.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Routine-blood-tests-could-accelerate-cancer-diagnosis-for-病人-with-stomach-pain-or-bloating.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=dba9b5d7-9f8f-44f9-b4fd-25e49c8d7722 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 15:08:00 -0400 Routine blood tests could accelerate cancer diagnosis for patients with stomach pain or bloating
家务劳动的精神负担损害母亲的心理健康妈妈们承担更多的家务活。但他们也是家庭高管，需要做更多的提前思考和分配工作，这些都是所有这些杂务的一部分——这对他们的心理健康来说是个坏消息。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Mental-load-of-household-tasks-takes-toll-on-mothers-mental-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Mental-load-of-household-tasks-takes-toll-on-mothers-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=598a80f0-b3cf-4472-8c70-65b9d0241df3 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:57:20 -0400 Mental load of household tasks takes toll on mothers' mental health
审查确定了医生不愿使用成瘾治疗的因素尽管美国成瘾和物质使用障碍的患病率很高，但在临床实践中采用循证物质使用障碍干预措施的医生数量仍然很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Review-identizes-factors-behind-physicals-reluctance-to-use-addiction-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Review-identizes-factors-behind-physicians-reluctance-to-use-addiction-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f6ecfc91-553a-4d01-80de-75ea4d698d04 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:51:14 -0400 Review identifies factors behind physicians' reluctance to use addiction treatments
新型双腔无线起搏器在临床试验中表现出可靠的性能根据威尔康奈尔医学院和纽约长老会研究人员共同领导的一项多中心国际临床试验的结果，双腔无线起搏器可在三个月内提供可靠的性能，为这种新型起搏器选择提供了证据。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/New-dual-chamber-wireless-pacemaker-shows-reliable-performance-in-clinical-trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/New-dual-chamber-wireless-pacemaker-shows-reliable-performance-in-clinical-trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5e5b0ad6-e3f8-4a52-abd1-dec7117a7d3d Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:39:57 -0400 New dual-chamber wireless pacemaker shows reliable performance in clinical trial
全职轮椅或电动滑板车使用者经历过跌倒，并生活在再次跌倒的恐惧之中科学家在一项新的研究中报告说，许多研究都集中在患有多发性硬化症或帕金森病等疾病的步行者跌倒问题上，但针对依赖轮椅或电动滑板车的人跌倒问题的研究却很少。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Full-time-wheelchair-or-motorized-scooter-users-experience-falls-and-live-with-the-fear-of-falling-again。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Full-time-wheelchair-or-motorized-scooter-users-experience-falls-and-live-with-the-fear-of-falling-again。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ef9e29ae-73c0-445e-b4cc-27414c78157a Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:34:20 -0400 Full-time wheelchair or motorized-scooter users experience falls and live with the fear of falling again
代谢综合征的表观遗传重编程和下丘脑变化代谢综合征 (MetS) 是一种多方面的疾病，影响着全球约 20-25% 的人口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Epigenic-reprogramming-and-hypothalamic-changes-in-metabolic-syndrome.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Epigenic-reprogramming-and-hypothalamic-changes-in-metabolic-syndrome.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca077ab6-2708-40f0-bd47-c15b47398364 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:11:39 -0400 Epigenetic reprogramming and hypothalamic changes in metabolic syndrome
研究揭示非法芬太尼使用与注射吸毒者中丙型肝炎病毒传播之间的联系来自加州大学圣地亚哥分校和墨西哥北弗龙特拉学院的一个国际研究小组揭示了圣地亚哥注射吸毒者中非法芬太尼的使用与丙型肝炎病毒 (HCV) 的传播之间存在显着关联，加利福尼亚州和墨西哥蒂华纳。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-reveals-link- Between-illicit-fentanyl-use-and-HCV-transmission-among-people-who-inject-drugs.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-reveals-link- Between-illicit-fentanyl-use-and-HCV-transmission-among-people-who-inject-drugs.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=477aff11-1beb-4b44-883a-1a6ead94d8eb Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:08:11 -0400 Study reveals link between illicit fentanyl use and HCV transmission among people who inject drugs
脂肪酸抑制剂联合化疗可提高乳腺癌脑转移患者的治疗效果密歇根大学健康罗格尔癌症中心的一项新研究发现，在化疗的同时给予脂肪酸抑制剂可以提高三阴性乳腺癌脑转移患者的治疗效果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Fatty-acid-inhibitor-plus-chemo-could-improve-treatment-efficacy-for-breast-cancer-患者-with-brain-metastases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Fatty-acid-inhibitor-plus-chemo-could-improve-treatment-efficacy-for-breast-cancer-患者-with-brain-metastases.aspx#评论https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58e631f4-26af-4cc7-8903-3cf0c7a51705 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:04:09 -0400 Fatty acid inhibitor plus chemo could improve treatment efficacy for breast cancer patients with brain metastases
研究发现睾丸中的 lncRNA 水平比之前估计的要高多伦多大学的研究人员绘制了睾丸中约 700 个长非编码 RNA（也称为 lncRNA）的空间分布图。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-finds-higher-levels-of-lncRNAs-in-the-testes-than-previously-estimated.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Study-finds-higher-levels-of-lncRNAs-in-the-testes-than-previously-estimated.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a5333d0-40ca-4772-8ce8-da2bafd5fbcd Tue, 30 Jul 2024 14:00:06 -0400 Study finds higher levels of lncRNAs in the testes than previously estimated
杜克大学-新加坡国立大学任命佛罗里达大学 Hendrik Luesch 教授扩大研究能力杜克大学-新加坡国立大学医学院今天宣布任命佛罗里达大学 (UF) 的 Hendrik Luesch 教授为联合教员。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Duke-NUS-expands-research-capability-with-appointment-of-Professor-Hendrik-Luesch-from-UF.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240730/Duke-NUS-expands-research-capability-with-appointment-of-Professor-Hendrik-Luesch-from-UF.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=25354f62-35bd-494b-842e-a12341a88a65 Tue, 30 Jul 2024 13:54:12 -0400 Duke-NUS expands research capabilities with appointment of Professor Hendrik Luesch from UF
